Line9.123237: Thank you, wanderer. You’re braver than most. Akarat must guide your path.
Line7.123237: Easy, I’ll help you to the healer, eh?
VoiceDir5.F1C75: Derin is wounded and pained, but still makes an effort to comfort Mateen's panic.
Line5.F1C75: (cough) It’s okay, Mateen. I just want to leave this place.
VoiceDir1.123237: Bewildered. Mixed emotions of relief, anxiety, and panic. He's relieved Derin is alive, but is also worried Derin will blame him for leaving Derin behind.
VoiceDir7.123237: Less panicked than before. He's more concerned about Derin's condition than his own feelings.
Line1.123237: Oh, I... I can’t believe it. I... if I knew he lived, I... I would have gathered a group... oh, I never should have run.
MenuLabel: “I found your lost friend alive. He needs to be taken to a healer.”
